Pre-Service Inspection.label: Open Car Hood
Pre-Service Inspection.description: A mechanic opens the hood of the silver Hyundai Santro to begin the pre-service inspection.

matched_actions.label: pointing at car
matched_actions.details: The person is pointing at the silver car with both hands, which are covered in black gloves.

matched_actions.label: touching car hood
matched_actions.details: The person places both gloved hands on the hood of the silver car.

Pre-Service Inspection.label: Check Engine Oil Level
Pre-Service Inspection.description: The mechanic uses the dipstick to check the level and condition of the engine oil before draining.

matched_actions.label: Pulling the dipstick
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand, wearing a black glove, pulls the yellow dipstick out of the engine.

matched_actions.label: Wiping the dipstick
matched_actions.details: The person's left hand holds a blue cloth, and the right hand, wearing a black glove, uses the cloth to wipe the yellow dipstick.

matched_actions.label: Inserting the dipstick
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand, wearing a black glove, begins to insert the yellow dipstick back into the engine.

matched_actions.label: Pushing the dipstick
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand, wearing a black glove, pushes the yellow dipstick further into the engine to fully insert it.

Pre-Service Inspection.label: Inspect Air Filter
Pre-Service Inspection.description: The mechanic opens the air filter housing and removes the old air filter for inspection.

matched_actions.label: placing cap
matched_actions.details: A gloved hand places a white cap onto a white fluid reservoir in the car's engine bay.

matched_actions.label: pressing cap
matched_actions.details: The gloved hand presses down on the white cap to secure it on the reservoir.

matched_actions.label: releasing cap
matched_actions.details: The gloved hand releases and moves away from the secured white cap on the reservoir.

matched_actions.label: reaching for engine cover
matched_actions.details: A gloved hand reaches towards the black plastic engine cover.

matched_actions.label: gripping engine cover
matched_actions.details: Both gloved hands grip the black plastic engine cover.

matched_actions.label: lifting engine cover
matched_actions.details: Both gloved hands begin to lift the black plastic engine cover upwards.

matched_actions.label: continuing to lift engine cover
matched_actions.details: Both gloved hands continue to lift the black plastic engine cover, revealing the air filter box underneath.

Replacing Engine Oil.label: Refill New Engine Oil
Replacing Engine Oil.description: New Mobil 1 0W-40 fully synthetic engine oil is poured into the engine using a funnel.

matched_actions.label: positioning a blue funnel
matched_actions.details: A hand in a black glove positions a blue funnel over an opening in the car engine bay.

matched_actions.label: holding a white bottle
matched_actions.details: Another hand in a black glove holds a white bottle near the blue funnel.

matched_actions.label: pouring liquid
matched_actions.details: The hand pours liquid from the white bottle into the blue funnel.

matched_actions.label: removing a white bottle
matched_actions.details: The hand removes the white bottle from the blue funnel.

matched_actions.label: removing a blue funnel
matched_actions.details: The hand removes the blue funnel from the opening in the car engine bay.

Replacing Air Filter.label: Replace Engine Air Filter
Replacing Air Filter.description: The old, dirty engine air filter is discarded and replaced with a new, genuine Hyundai air filter.

matched_actions.label: manipulating object
matched_actions.details: The person's hands are manipulating the black air filter housing cover.

matched_actions.label: lifting object
matched_actions.details: The person's hands are lifting the black air filter housing cover.

matched_actions.label: lifting object
matched_actions.details: The person's hands are lifting the black air filter housing cover further, exposing the air filter element.

matched_actions.label: grasping object
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand is grasping the white pleated air filter element.

matched_actions.label: pulling object
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand is pulling the white pleated air filter element upwards.

matched_actions.label: pulling object
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand is pulling the white pleated air filter element out of the housing.

matched_actions.label: holding object
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand is holding the white pleated air filter element, which is now mostly removed from the housing.

Coolant Top-Up.label: Top-Up Coolant
Coolant Top-Up.description: GoMechanic Smartcool coolant is added to the coolant expansion tank to bring it to the correct level.

matched_actions.label: Left hand inserting a black funnel into the radiator opening
matched_actions.details: The person's left hand is inserting a black funnel into the radiator opening of the car.

matched_actions.label: Left hand holding a black funnel in the radiator opening
matched_actions.details: The person's left hand is holding a black funnel that is inserted into the radiator opening.

matched_actions.label: Right hand holding a black cap
matched_actions.details: The person's right hand is holding a black cap, likely the radiator cap.

pending_sub_steps.label: Inspect Coolant Level
pending_sub_steps.description: The mechanic visually inspects the coolant level in the expansion tank.

pending_sub_steps.label: Inspect Brake Fluid Level
pending_sub_steps.description: The mechanic checks the level of the brake fluid in its reservoir.

pending_sub_steps.label: Position and Lift Car
pending_sub_steps.description: The vehicle is positioned over a two-post hydraulic lift, and the lift arms are placed under the jacking points before raising the car.

pending_sub_steps.label: Underbody Inspection
pending_sub_steps.description: Using a light, the mechanic inspects the car's underbody, including the suspension, exhaust system, and chassis for any issues.

pending_sub_steps.label: Check Tyre Tread Depth
pending_sub_steps.description: A digital tread depth gauge is used to measure the remaining tread on the rear tyre.

pending_sub_steps.label: Drain Old Engine Oil
pending_sub_steps.description: A wrench is used to loosen the drain plug, and the old, dark engine oil is drained into a collection pan.

pending_sub_steps.label: Replace Engine Oil Filter
pending_sub_steps.description: The old oil filter is removed, and a new, genuine Hyundai oil filter is unboxed, its gasket lubricated, and then installed.

pending_sub_steps.label: Remove Front Wheel
pending_sub_steps.description: After loosening the nuts with a pneumatic wrench, the front wheel is removed to access the brake assembly.

pending_sub_steps.label: Inspect Front Brake Pads
pending_sub_steps.description: The mechanic removes the brake pads from the caliper to check their thickness and condition before reinstalling them.

pending_sub_steps.label: Reinstall Front Wheel
pending_sub_steps.description: The wheel is mounted back onto the hub, the nuts are tightened with the pneumatic wrench, and the wheel cover is reattached.

pending_sub_steps.label: Inspect Spark Plug Condition
pending_sub_steps.description: A spark plug is removed from the engine, its electrode is inspected for wear, and the gap is checked with a feeler gauge.

pending_sub_steps.label: Apply Battery Terminal Spray
pending_sub_steps.description: A rust protection spray is applied to the battery terminals to prevent corrosion and ensure a good connection.

pending_sub_steps.label: Top-Up Brake Fluid
pending_sub_steps.description: GoMechanic DOT-4 brake fluid is added to the brake fluid reservoir to top it up.

pending_sub_steps.label: Top-Up Windshield Washer Fluid
pending_sub_steps.description: A concentrate is added to the windshield washer fluid reservoir, followed by water.

pending_sub_steps.label: Check Battery Voltage
pending_sub_steps.description: A digital multimeter is used to check the battery's voltage, which reads 12.82V, indicating a healthy charge.

pending_sub_steps.label: Clean and Reinstall Cabin Filter
pending_sub_steps.description: The cabin air filter is removed from behind the glove box, cleaned with compressed air, and then reinstalled.

pending_sub_steps.label: Perform Engine Scan
pending_sub_steps.description: An OBD-II scanner is connected to the car to read and clear any diagnostic trouble codes from the engine control unit (ECU).

pending_sub_steps.label: Underbody Pressure Wash
pending_sub_steps.description: The car is on a wash lift, and a high-pressure water jet is used to clean the underbody, wheel wells, and tyres.

pending_sub_steps.label: Exterior Foam Wash and Rinse
pending_sub_steps.description: The car's exterior is washed by hand with a soapy sponge and then thoroughly rinsed with a pressure washer.
